Adult_Dosing.text:
Black widow spider bite
2.5 mL IM/IV x1
Give skin or conjunctival test before use
May repeat dose x1
Prefer IV for severe cases

Pediatric_Dosing.text:
Black widow spider bite
<12 yo
2.5 mL IM/IV x1
Give skin or conjunctival test before use
May repeat dose x1
>12 yo
2.5 mL IM/IV x1
Give skin or conjunctival test before use
May repeat dose x1
Prefer IV for severe cases

Special_Populations.text:
Pregnancy Rating
: C; Benefits outweight risks during pregnancy
Lactation risk: L3; Safety unknown

Renal_Dosing.text:
Adult: Not defined
Pediatric: Not defined

Hepatic_Dosing.text:
Adult: Not defined
Pediatric: Not defined

Contraindications.text:
Allergy to class/drug
Caution if hypersensitivity to horse serum
Caution if
asthma

Common.text:
Injection site pain
Hypersensitivity reaction
Muscle cramps

Pharmacology.text:
Half-life: <15 days
Metabolism: Unknown
Excretion: Unknown
